item.description:
After the summer-from-hell-schedule, your Organizer is starting to surface.....

Let's take advantage of the Sunday Night Happy Hour Specials @ McCormick & Schmick (Park Plaza location):
$2.95 Angus Beef Burgers @ the bar - amongst other things - PROVIDED YOU PLACE YOUR ORDER BY 6.30PM
The rest of Happy Hour menu ranges in price from $1.95-$5.95.

So - beat the recession blues! - come down for a relaxing dinner for less than $10, a sundowner or two and some entertaining company & conversation.

Not planning to make it a late evening - but if you get the yen to stay longer, the bar is open until 1am on a Sunday.... :)

P.S. Sample Happy Hour Menu - there's also a Happy Hour Cocktail Menu (amazing "Parisian SideCars"!)....
item.name: Sunday wind-down - $2.95 burgers & yummy cocktails
